column4: hi, how could i clean up my dev from cached downloaded packages?
actually probably better to do what the other guy said.
i always log as root in the terminal
what happens when you run it from a terminal?
okay, but do you get an error..?
well that just means that's not what the executable is called.. how'd you install it?
deFrysk was right, the command is realplay
well i never use realplayer, maybe try typing real at a command prompt and hit tab twice to see what the possiblities are.
well maybe it didn't install anywhere in your path.. look for it in /opt maybe.
actually yea the longterm solution is what deFrysk says.
